availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Caleb S. Martin (Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Sarah A. Hudson Martin in Richmond, Kentucky, on November 11, 1857. Father of Horace G. Martin, Walter T. Martin, Fanny Martin, and Jane Martin. Farmer in Jackson County in 1860. Farmer in Jackson County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jackson County, My Division, p. 873.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jackson County, Horselick, p. 196A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Madison County Marriages, Film #000183316, p. 313.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Jackson County, KY, June 1863, p. 242 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Caleb Sidney Martin (1829-1901)," Memorial #5191846, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5191846 (accessed April 6, 2020).
